A '''Great Master''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is a [[Slavery|slave-trader]] from the city of [[Meereen]], on the coast of [[Slaver's Bay]]. He is played by guest star [[Derek Horsham]] and appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of the many [[Great Masters]] that gather over the walls of Meereen when [[Daenerys Targaryen]] and her army appear before the city gates to lay [[Siege of Meereen|siege]] to the city. After the death of Meereenese champion [[Oznak zo Pahl]] and Daenerys' words to the slaves present, he looks in confusion as [[Slave (Breaker of Chains)|a slave]] picks up one of the hundreds of broken slave collars thrown into the city in catapulted barrels.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref> After Daenerys sacks the city, she orders the crucifixion of the great masters of Meereen as justice for the 163 slave children nailed to sign-posts on the road from [[Yunkai]] to Meereen. It is evident that this Great Master was one of the Great Masters killed.<ref>[[Oathkeeper]]</ref>
